languages.text: "Ваш род не склонен к разговорам — лишь к бессмысленному разрушению. Мон-кай осквернили и уничтожили наш дом, Лилэтан — не сомневаюсь, в том числе и из своей примитивной тяги к насилию. Это искусство, в котором вы превосходите иные, более древние народы вселенной".

traits.locale_text: "Ваш род не склонен к разговорам — лишь к бессмысленному разрушению. Мон-кай осквернили и уничтожили наш дом, Лилэтан — не сомневаюсь, в том числе и из своей примитивной тяги к насилию. Это искусство, в котором вы превосходите иные, более древние народы вселенной".

languages.text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."
languages.original_text: "Ваш род не склонен к разговорам — лишь к бессмысленному разрушению. Мон-кай осквернили и уничтожили наш дом, Лилэтан — не сомневаюсь, в том числе и из своей примитивной тяги к насилию. Это искусство, в котором вы превосходите иные, более древние народы вселенной".

traits.locale_text: "Your kind is not inclinable to talking — rather to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, Lilethan — all because of their primitive affinity, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other, more ancient civilizations of the universe."

"Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilizations of the universe."

"Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilizations of the universe."

"Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

languages.text: “你们这种人并不适合和谈，只适合毫无意义的破坏。猴子腐化了我们的家园莉莱赞，将它破坏殆尽。毫无疑问，这都是由于他们天生亲近暴力。你们在这门艺术上的成就，早已超过了宇宙中其他更加古老的文明。”
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: “你们这种人并不适合和谈，只适合毫无意义的破坏。猴子腐化了我们的家园莉莱赞，将它破坏殆尽。毫无疑问，这都是由于他们天生亲近暴力。你们在这门艺术上的成就，早已超过了宇宙中其他更加古老的文明。”

languages.text: 「人類の言うことなど素直に受け入れられぬ—無意味な破壊につながるのみだ。モン＝ケイは我らの故郷リラエタンを腐らせ、跡形もなく破壊しようとしている。これは、暴力への嗜好を根源的に孕んでいるからに違いない。この点における人類の進歩は、宇宙のはるか太古に存在した文明の進歩さえはるかに上回る」
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の言うことなど素直に受け入れられぬ—無意味な破壊につながるのみだ。モン＝ケイは我らの故郷リラエタンを腐らせ、跡形もなく破壊しようとしている。これは、暴力への嗜好を根源的に孕んでいるからに違いない。この点における人類の進歩は、宇宙のはるか太古に存在した文明の進歩さえはるかに上回る」

languages.text: "Euresgleichen hält nicht viel von Gesprächen – nur von sinnloser Zerstörung. Die Chem-Pan-Sey haben unsere Heimat Lileath korrumpiert und vernichtet – und das ohne Zweifel nur wegen ihres primitiven Hangs zur Gewalt. Eure Vorstöße in dieser Kunst übertreffen die anderer, bedeutend älterer Zivilisationen im Universum."
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Euresgleichen hält nicht viel von Gesprächen – nur von sinnloser Zerstörung. Die Chem-Pan-Sey haben unsere Heimat Lileath korrumpiert und vernichtet – und das ohne Zweifel nur wegen ihres primitiven Hangs zur Gewalt. Eure Vorstöße in dieser Kunst übertreffen die anderer, bedeutend älterer Zivilisationen im Universum."

languages.text: « Votre espèce n'est pas disposée à discuter, seulement à semer la destruction. Les mon-keigh ont corrompu et dévasté notre foyer, la lilaethan, probablement à cause de leur affinité primitive pour la violence. Vos avancées dans cet art surpassent celles d'autres civilisations bien plus anciennes. »
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: « Votre espèce n'est pas disposée à discuter, seulement à semer la destruction. Les mon-keigh ont corrompu et dévasté notre foyer, la lilaethan, probablement à cause de leur affinité primitive pour la violence. Vos avancées dans cet art surpassent celles d'autres civilisations bien plus anciennes. »

languages.text: «Vuestra gente no es receptiva a las palabras, tan solo a la destrucción indiscriminada. Los mon-keigh habéis corrompido y arrasado nuestro hogar, el Lilaethan, y todo por su inclinación primitiva por la violencia, sin duda. Vuestros logros en ese arte eclipsan a los de muchas de las civilizaciones más antiguas del universo».
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: «Vuestra gente no es receptiva a las palabras, tan solo a la destrucción indiscriminada. Los mon-keigh habéis corrompido y arrasado nuestro hogar, el Lilaethan, y todo por su inclinación primitiva por la violencia, sin duda. Vuestros logros en ese arte eclipsan a los de muchas de las civilizaciones más antiguas del universo».

languages.text: "Türün, konuşarak anlaşmaktan âcizdir... Siz sadece şuursuzca yakıp yıkmaktan anlarsınız. Mon-keighlar yurdumuzu, Lilaethan'ı yozlaştırıp aşındırdı... Bunun sebebi, hiç şüphesiz ilkelce şiddete meyilli olmaları. Bu alanda gerçekleştirdiğiniz gelişmeler; evrenin diğer, daha kadim medeniyetlerini aşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Your kind is not amenable to talking — only to senseless destruction. The mon-keigh have corrupted and obliterated our home, the Lilaethan — all because of their primitive affinity for violence, no doubt. Your advances in this art surpass those of other more ancient civilisations of the universe."

traits.locale_text: "Türün, konuşarak anlaşmaktan âcizdir... Siz sadece şuursuzca yakıp yıkmaktan anlarsınız. Mon-keighlar yurdumuzu, Lilaethan'ı yozlaştırıp aşındırdı... Bunun sebebi, hiç şüphesiz ilkelce şiddete meyilli olmaları. Bu alanda gerçekleştirdiğiniz gelişmeler; evrenin diğer, daha kadim medeniyetlerini aşıyor."
